author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Five! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Giacomo Pantalone (Full Spectrum Dominance) and Federico Valsecchi j have taken their stab at a universal 'modern' skirmish game, suitable for any period using firearms up to robots and lasers. Card driven, the uni profles allow you to quickly generate a team of 6-12 models and manage them on scaling battlefields in anything from 6mm to full 32mm combat.  Let's dive in!

Check out the Rulebook HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/en/product/227996/round-of-fire-core-rules?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 045 - ROUND OF FIRE by THE LAZY GAMES
